title: Cardano DeFi Builder Sprint with Minswap Labs & Danogo
summary: Cardano is facing a severe shortage of experienced DeFi teams in Vietnam, and lacks an effective pipeline to turn ideas into real products, causing ecosystem development and TVL growth to stagnate.
solution: Cardano DeFi Builder Sprint is a Hackathon Program, led by Sky3Team and overseen by Minswap Labs & Danogo, giving builders direct access to tier-1 projects and strengthening Cardano’s talent pipeline.
proposer_relevant_experience:
**1\. James Ha \- Growth Manager, Sky3Team**

- 5+ years of experience in the blockchain industry
- Founder and advisor for 10+ Web3 projects across DeFi, NFTs, and infrastructure
- Twitter (X): [https://x\.com/James\_Sky3team](https://x.com/James_Sky3team)

**2\. Amy Doan \- Partnership Manager, Sky3Team**

- 4+ years in business development & partnership management in blockchain, NFT and GameFi
- Proven experience cultivating partnerships with KOLs, influencers, and strategic partners
- Led partnership initiatives at Icetea Labs/GameFi.org, SkyChain Capital and Junction Vietnam
- Linkedin: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/amy\-doan\-430910216/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/amy-doan-430910216/)

**3\. Mia Vu \- Event Coordinator, Sky3Team**

- 2+ years of experience organizing tech and Web3 events across Vietnam, including large conferences, community meetups, and builder-focused workshops.
- Managed end-to-end logistics, speaker relations, and attendee engagement for 2 side events at GM Vietnam (~200 participants), networking brunches, and weekly meetups/workshops for the Cardano ecosystem.
- Skilled in venue coordination, agenda planning, partner/sponsor onboarding, and on-site operations.
- Linkedin: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/hatvu2010/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hatvu2010/)

**4\. Mio Nguyen \- Marketing Executive, Sky3Team**

- 2+ years of experience in marketing strategy and execution, with a focus on blockchain and emerging technologies.
- Managed end-to-end marketing campaigns for Web3 events, increasing participant turnout by 30% through targeted outreach.
- Skilled in digital marketing channels (social media, content marketing, paid ads) and partnership development with tech hubs and media.
- Strong track record in community growth, successfully scaling online communities to 5,000+ active members.
- [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/nguyen\-thi\-quynh\-anh\-0743b42b9/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nguyen-thi-quynh-anh-0743b42b9/)



**Advisors**

- Strong advocate for decentralization & SPO empowerment

**2\. Mr\. Linh Do \- Co\-founder of Danogo**

- Co-founder of Danogo.io, contributing to product architecture and ecosystem strategy.

- Experienced in product leadership, system design, and technical mentoring for early-stage teams.
- Linkedin: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/tran\-linh\-do\-54536660/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tran-linh-do-54536660/)

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
We are planning on targeting **15\-20 experienced builders & small teams** in Vietnam - one of the fastest-growing builder hubs in the SEA region. We are going to reach them via the following channels: 

- Cardano Vietnam Community and official Discord/Twitter
- Minswap Labs, Danogo and Sky3Team official Discord/Twitter
- Promotion and Direct invites via Catalyst-funded teams, university blockchain clubs…
- GM Vietnam Official Channel, GM Vietnam Side-event Channel

Why it matters: Vietnam has the highest builder-to-user ratio in SEA. Converting senior local talent into production DeFi projects for Minswap Labs & Danogo will directly boost Cardano TVL and transaction volume in 2026.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- 3-round hackathon showcasing DeFi solutions/projects for Cardano/Minswap/Cardano:
    - Round 1 – Idea submission and screening (3 weeks)
    - Round 2 – Working prototype + weekly workshops/mentorships from Minswap Labs/Danogo (5 weeks)
    - Round 3 – Final sprint (2 week) including a 2-3 day intensive Hacker House in Hanoi/HCMC (24/7 co-working space, free meals/snacks, on-site mentors)
- Grand Finale: Live demo and awarding as official GM Vietnam 2026 side-event.
- Post-event integration support
- Full event recording and highlight reel distributed across Cardano channels

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- At least 20 applications submitted for Round 01
- At least 10 projects nurtured in Round 02
- At least 200 people join & watch Grand Finale (GM Vietnam side-event)
- Top 3 projects fully open-source & ready for mainnet
- Positive feedbacks from ≥ 80% of applicants joined after Grand Finale

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
We are organizing “Cardano DeFi Builder Sprint” – a high-intensity 10-week sprint with a 2-day hackathon exclusively for experienced Vietnamese & global builders, supported by Minswap Labs and Danogo, the two largest and most active DeFi protocols on Cardano.

The program is structured as a progressive-elimination track designed to turn senior local talent into production-ready DeFi products as quickly and effectively as possible:

- Round 1 (Week 1–3): Idea submission + rigorous screening of track record
- Round 2 (Week 4-8): Working prototype phase with weekly 1:1 mentorship from Minswap Labs and Danogo core teams
- Round 3 (Week 9-10): One-week final sprint culminating in a 2 day intensive Hacker House in Hanoi/HCMC – a 24/7 co-working space with free meals, snacks, on-site mentors, and non-stop building alongside the two protocol teams
- Grand Finale: Live Demo Day & awarding ceremony staged as an official side-event of GM Vietnam 2026 in front of 200+ attendees and global livestream

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
This proposal directly attacks one of Cardano’s most critical strategic gaps in 2025–2026: despite Vietnam consistently ranking Top 3 globally in crypto adoption and grassroots Web3 talent, Vietnamese builders remain dramatically under-represented in actual on-chain DeFi products and TVL contribution on Cardano.

The hackathon will deliver the following measurable, long-lasting impacts to the wider Cardano ecosystem:

- Immediate conversion of 15-20 Vietnamese builders into deeply engaged Cardano DeFi contributors.
- Creation of 3-5 new DeFi primitives and applications that route real liquidity and volume through Minswap and Danogo
- Multiplier effect: winning projects receive direct marketing amplifications and partnerships from the two largest Cardano DeFi protocols – creating a self-reinforcing growth loop that finally brings a meaningful share of Vietnam’s massive crypto user base into Cardano DeFi in 2026 and beyond.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
**1\. Proven event model from prior Catalyst\-funded initiatives**

Sky3Team has proven, large-scale operational execution in Vietnam’s Cardano ecosystem. From 2023–2025, we have successfully delivered:

- Organizing Cardano Blockchain Meetup Special in Hanoi and multiple offline builder meetups, reaching 70+ attendees each
- Media partnerships and supporting flagship Cardano events (Cardano Night Hanoi, Saigon Ledger Night, Builder Fest Asia)
- Hosting & moderating the Cardano Builder Meetup Online Series (6 episodes)
- Consistent community presence: 2,000 organic followers on X, 100+ active members in Cardano Builder, Dev Vietnam
- Partnerships with Cardano Vietnam Community and multiple university blockchain clubs.

These activities demonstrate deep trust, transparency, and long-term commitment within Vietnam’s builder ecosystem.

**2\. Preliminary commitments from Minswap Labs and Danogo**

Minswap Labs and Danogo – representing >60% of Cardano DEX volume – have expressed preliminary support through ongoing discussions. They have confirmed interest in:

- Providing advisorship for the hackathon as a whole.
- Providing core contributors for mentorship sessions.
- Sharing judging rubrics and prototype guidelines.
- Offering post-event liquidity/marketing incentives for aligned projects.

**3\. Vietnam's Builder Landscape**

Vietnam leads Southeast Asia in blockchain talent, with over **6,000 qualified blockchain developers** already active (per Vietnam Software and IT Services Association, 2025) and a projected need for 200,000 more in blockchain/fintech/AI by 2028 (TopDev 2025 Report). As the largest developer hub in SEA (SEA Blockchain Developer Ecosystem Report, 2024), Vietnam boasts **560,000 IT professionals and 55,000–60,000 annual IT graduates**, with many focused on Web3.

**4\. Cardano DeFi Strength**

- DeFi is Cardano's fastest-growing pillar, with TVL projected to hit $5–10B by 2026 via Bitcoin bridges, RWAs, and stablecoins like DJED/USDA).
- Key protocols like Minswap, Danogo and Liqwid dominate over 60% of DEX/lending volume, driving transaction fees, liquidity, and ecosystem utility.

Therefore, organizing a DeFi sprint is thus low-risk: It leverages Cardano's maturing infrastructure and VN talent to create primitives routing volume through Minswap/Danogo, directly boosting TVL/adoption.

**5\. Logistics and venue planning aligned with established networks**

Venue selection will prioritize cost-effective co-working spaces in Hanoi, Da Nang or HCMC, depend on the location of GM Vietnam 2026. Budget quotes (7,000 ADA for 3 days) match rates from our previous workshops.

**6\. Grand Finale planned as a side\-event at GM Vietnam 2026**

We plan to integrate the Grand Finale as **an official side\-event at GM Vietnam Blockchain Week** (expected July 2026, Hanoi – based on 2025 edition at National Convention Center, 200+ attendees). Sky3Team has prior experience with GM side-events (e.g., Cardano Night Hanoi as GM Vietnam 2025 side-event). This secures global attention and exposure at no extra cost.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
**Budget Breakdown Summary**

1. Milestone 1 – Launch Preparation & Application Phase (10,125 ADA / 4,050 USD)
- Website + application platform setup
- Technical training and onboarding materials
- Coordination with Minswap Labs and Danogo
- Initial builder outreach channels
- Marketing launch campaign (Twitter/X, Telegram, Cardano VN)
- Personnel for project setup, graphic design and content creation
2. Milestone 2 – Round 1 Completion and Shortlist (2,813 ADA / 1,125 USD)
- Judge compensation for application screening
- Personnel for screening, communication, and operations
3. Milestone 3 – Round 2 Completion, Prototypes and Top 5 Selection (7,250 ADA / 2,900 USD)
- Weekly mentorship sessions (4 weeks)
- Technical support & submission platform
- Judge compensation for prototype evaluation
- Personnel for oversight, coordination, and documentation
4. Milestone 4 – Final Sprint, Hacker House & GM Vietnam Demo Day (39,750 ADA / 15,900 USD)
- Travel fee for top teams
- 2.5–3 day Hacker House venue rental
- Meals, snacks & work environment for participating teams
- On-site mentorship and support activities
- GM Vietnam Demo Day stage venue and event production
- Personnel for event operations, media, and reporting



Please check here for a detailed breakdown of our budget: [https://docs\.google\.com/spreadsheets/d/1pqpI0VGpVFbX8OZ4Korv3mX7kOYfEVh27hBre8DE8fg/edit?gid=0\#gid=0](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pqpI0VGpVFbX8OZ4Korv3mX7kOYfEVh27hBre8DE8fg/edit?gid=0#gid=0) 

The base conversion rate for ADA-USD is 0.40

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
At just 60,000 ADA (~$24,000 USD), this proposal delivers one of the highest expected ROI opportunities in Fund15 for the following reasons:

**1\. Direct, measurable TVL impact**

The hackathon is supported by **Minswap Labs and Danogo** – the two largest DeFi protocols on Cardano. Winning projects are pre-committed to route liquidity and volume through these protocols from day one.

**2\. Permanent talent activation at ultra\-low cost**

Vietnam has the highest builder-to-user ratio in SEA and ranks Top 5 globally in crypto adoption, yet contributes almost zero meaningful DeFi TVL to Cardano today. This single 60k ADA investment converts **15\-20 senior Vietnamese builders** into long-term Cardano-native DeFi contributors – talent that would otherwise build on Solana or Ethereum L2s.

**3\. Maximum exposure, minimum overhead**

Grand Finale as an official GM Vietnam 2026 side-event guarantees exposure to **200\+ live attendees \+ global attention**. All content (recordings, highlight reels, reports) will be fully open-source and distributed across Cardano channels for ongoing ecosystem benefit.

**4\. Zero credibility risk**

Supported by the two largest DeFi teams on Cardano + a core team with 100% milestone acceptance on four previous large-scale Catalyst-funded events in Vietnam.

sub_fields.title: I Agree
sub_fields.description: I confirm that I have read, understand and shall adhere to the [Project Catalyst Platform Terms of Use](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-terms-of-use), [Project Catalyst Platform Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-privacy-policy), [Terms & Conditions](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions), [Fund Rules](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/fund-rules), [Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/catalyst-fc-privacy-policy). I understand that providing accurate and truthful information is essential for my proposal to remain eligible to participate in the current Fund.
